com.davidmiguel.gobees.monitoring.algorithm

Interface BeesCounter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AreaBeesCounter

    public interface BeesCounter
    A BeeCounter has to count the number of bees present in a given frame.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  BeesCounter.BlobSize

      int countBees(org.opencv.core.Mat frame)
      Count the number of bees in a frame.

    • Method Detail

      • countBees

        int countBees(org.opencv.core.Mat frame)
        Count the number of bees in a frame.
        Parameters:
        frame - the target frame in CV_8UC1 Mat format.
        Returns:
        number of bees counted.

      • getProcessedFrame

        org.opencv.core.Mat getProcessedFrame()
        Get a processed frame with the bees highlighted in green and the rest of contours in red.
        Returns:
        CV_8UC3 Mat with bees highlighted

      • updateBlobSize

        void updateBlobSize(BeesCounter.BlobSize size)
        Update blob size. This causes regions within an image get "thicker" or "thinner".
        Parameters:
        size - desired size.

      • updateMinArea

        void updateMinArea(java.lang.Double minArea)
        Update min area. Smaller areas are not consider to be a bee.
        Parameters:
        minArea - min area.

      • updateMaxArea

        void updateMaxArea(java.lang.Double maxArea)
        Update max area. Greater areas are not consider to be a bee.
        Parameters:
        maxArea - max area.
